activities:
Interserver, inc is a web hosting company that receives personal information online for sales, support, and billing.
Interserver, inc uses the personal information collected to provide a personalized internet experience and to deliver information, services and products to customers. Interserver, Inc collects this information from clients in the EU who may during the course of their business relationship.
